data.Name: The Mission UK
data.Bio: The Mission (briefly known as The Sisterhood in 1986, not to be confused with The Sisterhood, and known as The Mission UK in the United States[1]) were a gothic rock band formed in 1986 from the splinters of the freshly dissolved rock band The Sisters of Mercy. The band was started by frontman Wayne Hussey and bassist Craig Adams (both from the Sisters of Mercy), soon adding drummer Mick Brown (Red Lorry Yellow Lorry) and guitarist Simon Hinkler (Artery and Pulp). Aside from Hussey, the line-up has changed several times during the years. Read more on Last.fm
